mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RESERVATION (RESERVATIONNUM, RESTAURANTNUM, ID, COUNT, TIME, RESERVATIONTIME, VISITSTATUS) VALUES (NULL, #{restaurantNum}, #{id}, #{count}, now(), #{reservationTime}, 0)
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT RV.*, M.NAME, M.BLACKLIST FROM RESERVATION RV LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON (RV.ID = M.ID) WHERE RV.RESTAURANTNUM = #{restaurantNum}) R WHERE VISITSTATUS = 3 AND RESERVATIONTIME BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} ORDER BY BLACKLIST ASC, RESERVATIONTIME ASC LIMIT #{startRow}, #{perPage}
mapper.update: UPDATE RESERVATION SET VISITSTATUS = #{visitStatus} WHERE RESERVATIONNUM = ${reservationNum} AND VISITSTATUS = 0
